goal: binomial_term(a, b, m.suc, k.suc) = a * binomial_term(a, b, m, k.suc - 1) + b * binomial_term(a, b, m, k.suc)
proof: function(x0: Nat, x1: Nat) { x0 < x1 or x1 < x0 or x0 = x1 }(0, k.suc)
function(x0: Nat, x1: Nat) { not x0 < x1 or x0.suc <= x1 }(k, m)
function(x0: Nat) { not x0 < 0 }(k.suc)
function(x0: Nat) { 0 != x0.suc }(k)

function[T0: CommRing](x0: Nat, x1: Nat, x2: T0, x3: T0) { not 0 < x0 or not x0 <= x1 or T0.mul(x2, binomial_term[T0](x2, x3, x1, x0 - 1)) + T0.mul(x3, binomial_term[T0](x2, x3, x1, x0)) = binomial_term[T0](x2, x3, x1.suc, x0) }[R](k.suc, m, a, b)
k.suc <= m
not 0 < k.suc
function(x0: Nat) { x0.suc - 1 = x0 }(k)
function(x0: Nat) { compose[Nat, Nat, R](binomial_term(a, b, m.suc), Nat.suc, x0) = h(x0) }(k)
function[T0, T1, T2](x0: T1 -> T2, x1: T0 -> T1, x2: T0) { compose[T0, T1, T2](x0, x1, x2) = x0(x1(x2)) }[Nat, Nat, R](binomial_term(a, b, m.suc), Nat.suc, k)

goal: binomial_term(a, b, m.suc, k.suc) = a * binomial_term(a, b, m, k) + b * binomial_term(a, b, m, k.suc)
proof: function[T0: CommRing](x0: Nat, x1: Nat, x2: T0, x3: T0) { not x0 < x1 or T0.mul(x2, binomial_term[T0](x2, x3, x1, x0)) + T0.mul(x3, binomial_term[T0](x2, x3, x1, x0.suc)) = binomial_term[T0](x2, x3, x1.suc, x0.suc) }[R](k, m, a, b)

goal: h(k) = a * binomial_term(a, b, m, k) + b * binomial_term(a, b, m, k.suc)
proof: a * binomial_term(a, b, m, k) + b * binomial_term(a, b, m, k.suc) != binomial_term(a, b, m.suc, k.suc)
function(x0: Nat) { binomial_term(a, b, m, x0) = f(x0) }(k)
function(x0: Nat) { compose[Nat, Nat, R](binomial_term(a, b, m), Nat.suc, x0) = g(x0) }(k)
function[T0, T1, T2](x0: T1 -> T2, x1: T0 -> T1, x2: T0) { compose[T0, T1, T2](x0, x1, x2) = x0(x1(x2)) }[R, R, R]((a * binomial_term(a, b, m, k)).add, b.mul, binomial_term(a, b, m, k.suc))
function[T0, T1, T2](x0: T1 -> T2, x1: T0 -> T1, x2: T0) { compose[T0, T1, T2](x0, x1, x2) = x0(x1(x2)) }[Nat, Nat, R](binomial_term(a, b, m), Nat.suc, k)
function[T0, T1, T2](x0: T1 -> T2, x1: T0 -> T1, x2: T0) { compose[T0, T1, T2](x0, x1, x2) = x0(x1(x2)) }[R, R, R]((a * f(k)).add, b.mul, g(k))

goal: h(k) = mul_fn[Nat, R](a, f)(k) + mul_fn[Nat, R](b, g)(k)
proof: function[T0, T1: lib(semigroup).Semigroup](x0: T1, x1: T0 -> T1, x2: T0) { mul_fn[T0, T1](x0, x1, x2) = T1.mul(x0, x1(x2)) }[Nat, R](b, g, k)

goal: partial[R](h, m) = partial[R](add_fn[Nat, R](mul_fn[Nat, R](a, f), mul_fn[Nat, R](b, g)), m)
proof: let s0[T0: lib(add_comm_monoid).AddCommMonoid]: (Nat -> T0, Nat -> T0, Nat) -> Nat satisfy { forall(x0: Nat -> T0, x1: Nat -> T0, x2: Nat) { s0(x0, x1, x2) < x2 or partial[T0](x0, x2) = partial[T0](x1, x2) } and forall(x3: Nat -> T0, x4: Nat -> T0, x5: Nat) { x3(s0(x3, x4, x5)) != x4(s0(x3, x4, x5)) or partial[T0](x3, x5) = partial[T0](x4, x5) } }
function(x0: Nat) { not x0 < m or mul_fn(a, f, x0) + mul_fn(b, g, x0) = h(x0) }(s0(h, add_fn[Nat, R](mul_fn[Nat, R](a, f), mul_fn[Nat, R](b, g)), m))

function[T0: lib(add_comm_monoid).AddCommMonoid](x0: Nat -> T0, x1: Nat -> T0, x2: Nat) { s0(x0, x1, x2) < x2 or partial[T0](x0, x2) = partial[T0](x1, x2) }[R](h, add_fn[Nat, R](mul_fn[Nat, R](a, f), mul_fn[Nat, R](b, g)), m)

function[T0: lib(add_comm_monoid).AddCommMonoid](x0: Nat -> T0, x1: Nat -> T0, x2: Nat) { x0(s0(x0, x1, x2)) != x1(s0(x0, x1, x2)) or partial[T0](x0, x2) = partial[T0](x1, x2) }[R](h, add_fn[Nat, R](mul_fn[Nat, R](a, f), mul_fn[Nat, R](b, g)), m)

function[T0, T1: lib(add_semigroup).AddSemigroup](x0: T0 -> T1, x1: T0 -> T1, x2: T0) { add_fn[T0, T1](x0, x1, x2) = T1.add(x0(x2), x1(x2)) }[Nat, R](mul_fn[Nat, R](a, f), mul_fn[Nat, R](b, g), s0(h, add_fn[Nat, R](mul_fn[Nat, R](a, f), mul_fn[Nat, R](b, g)), m))
s0(h, add_fn[Nat, R](mul_fn[Nat, R](a, f), mul_fn[Nat, R](b, g)), m) < m

add_fn[Nat, R](mul_fn[Nat, R](a, f), mul_fn[Nat, R](b, g), s0(h, add_fn[Nat, R](mul_fn[Nat, R](a, f), mul_fn[Nat, R](b, g)), m)) != h(s0(h, add_fn[Nat, R](mul_fn[Nat, R](a, f), mul_fn[Nat, R](b, g)), m))

mul_fn(a, f, s0(h, add_fn[Nat, R](mul_fn[Nat, R](a, f), mul_fn[Nat, R](b, g)), m)) + mul_fn(b, g, s0(h, add_fn[Nat, R](mul_fn[Nat, R](a, f), mul_fn[Nat, R](b, g)), m)) = h(s0(h, add_fn[Nat, R](mul_fn[Nat, R](a, f), mul_fn[Nat, R](b, g)), m))

mul_fn(a, f, s0(h, add_fn[Nat, R](mul_fn[Nat, R](a, f), mul_fn[Nat, R](b, g)), m)) + mul_fn(b, g, s0(h, add_fn[Nat, R](mul_fn[Nat, R](a, f), mul_fn[Nat, R](b, g)), m)) != h(s0(h, add_fn[Nat, R](mul_fn[Nat, R](a, f), mul_fn[Nat, R](b, g)), m))

goal: partial[R](h, m) = partial[R](mul_fn[Nat, R](a, f), m) + partial[R](mul_fn[Nat, R](b, g), m)
proof: function[T0: lib(add_comm_monoid).AddCommMonoid](x0: Nat -> T0, x1: Nat -> T0, x2: Nat) { partial[T0](add_fn[Nat, T0](x0, x1), x2) = partial[T0](x0, x2) + partial[T0](x1, x2) }[R](mul_fn[Nat, R](a, f), mul_fn[Nat, R](b, g), m)

goal: partial[R](h, m) = a * partial[R](f, m) + b * partial[R](g, m)
proof: function[T0: lib(semiring.base).Semiring](x0: T0, x1: Nat -> T0, x2: Nat) { partial[T0](mul_fn[Nat, T0](x0, x1), x2) = T0.mul(x0, partial[T0](x1, x2)) }[R](b, g, m)

function[T0, T1, T2](x0: (T0, T1) -> T2, x1: T1, x2: T0) { lib(util).flip[T0, T1, T2](x0, x1, x2) = x0(x2, x1) }[Nat -> R, Nat, R](partial[R], m, h)
function[T0, T1, T2](x0: (T0, T1) -> T2, x1: T1, x2: T0) { lib(util).flip[T0, T1, T2](x0, x1, x2) = x0(x2, x1) }[Nat -> R, Nat, R](partial[R], m, f)
function[T0, T1, T2](x0: (T0, T1) -> T2, x1: T1, x2: T0) { lib(util).flip[T0, T1, T2](x0, x1, x2) = x0(x2, x1) }[Nat -> R, Nat, R](partial[R], m, binomial_term(a, b, m))
function[T0, T1, T2](x0: (T0, T1) -> T2, x1: T1, x2: T0) { lib(util).flip[T0, T1, T2](x0, x1, x2) = x0(x2, x1) }[Nat -> R, Nat, R](partial[R], m, g)

compose[Nat, Nat, R](binomial_term(a, b, m), Nat.suc) = g
compose[Nat, Nat, R](binomial_term(a, b, m.suc), Nat.suc) = h

goal: (a + b) * partial[R](binomial_term(a, b, m), m.suc) = a * partial[R](binomial_term(a, b, m), m.suc) + b * partial[R](binomial_term(a, b, m), m.suc)

proof: function[T0: CommRing](x0: T0, x1: T0, x2: Nat) { binomial_term[T0](x0, x1, x2.suc, x2.suc) = T0.mul(x0, binomial_term[T0](x0, x1, x2, x2)) }[R](a, b, m)

goal: binomial_term(a, b, m.suc, 0) = b * binomial_term(a, b, m, 0)
proof: function[T0: CommRing](x0: T0, x1: T0, x2: Nat) { binomial_term[T0](x0, x1, x2.suc, 0) = T0.mul(x1, binomial_term[T0](x0, x1, x2, 0)) }[R](a, b, m)

goal: partial[R](compose[Nat, Nat, R](binomial_term(a, b, m.suc), Nat.suc), m) = a * partial[R](binomial_term(a, b, m), m) + b * partial[R](compose[Nat, Nat, R](binomial_term(a, b, m), Nat.suc), m)

goal: rhs_part1 = b * binomial_term(a, b, m, 0) + a * partial[R](binomial_term(a, b, m), m) + b * partial[R](compose[Nat, Nat, R](binomial_term(a, b, m), Nat.suc), m)

goal: b * binomial_term(a, b, m, 0) + b * partial[R](compose[Nat, Nat, R](binomial_term(a, b, m), Nat.suc), m) = b * partial[R](binomial_term(a, b, m), m.suc)

goal: partial[R](binomial_term(a, b, m.suc), m.suc.suc) = b * partial[R](binomial_term(a, b, m), m.suc) + a * partial[R](binomial_term(a, b, m), m) + a * binomial_term(a, b, m, m)

goal: a * partial[R](binomial_term(a, b, m), m) + a * binomial_term(a, b, m, m) = a * partial[R](binomial_term(a, b, m), m.suc)
proof: function[T0: lib(semiring.base).Semiring](x0: T0, x1: T0, x2: T0) { T0.mul(x0, x1) + T0.mul(x0, x2) = T0.mul(x0, T0.add(x1, x2)) }[R](a, partial[R](binomial_term(a, b, m), m), binomial_term(a, b, m, m))

function(x0: Nat) { x0 - 0 = x0 }(0)

function[T0, T1, T2](x0: T1 -> T2, x1: T0 -> T1, x2: T0) { compose[T0, T1, T2](x0, x1, x2) = x0(x1(x2)) }[Nat, R, R -> R](R.mul, from_nat[R], choose(0, 0))
function[T0, T1, T2](x0: T1 -> T2, x1: T0 -> T1, x2: T0) { compose[T0, T1, T2](x0, x1, x2) = x0(x1(x2)) }[Nat, R, R -> R](R.mul, from_nat[R], 1)
function[T0, T1, T2](x0: T1 -> T2, x1: T0 -> T1, x2: T0) { compose[T0, T1, T2](x0, x1, x2) = x0(x1(x2)) }[R, R, R -> R](R.mul, from_nat[R](1).mul, R.1)
function[T0: lib(monoid).Monoid](x0: T0) { T0.pow(x0, 0) = T0.1 }[R](b)
function[T0: lib(monoid).Monoid](x0: T0) { T0.pow(x0, 0) = T0.1 }[R](a)
function[T0: lib(semiring.base).Semiring] { from_nat[T0](1) = T0.1 }[R]
function(x0: Nat) { choose(x0, 0) = 1 }(0)
function[T0: lib(comm_semigroup).CommSemigroup](x0: T0, x1: T0) { T0.mul(x0, x1) = T0.mul(x1, x0) }[R](from_nat[R](1), R.1)
function[T0: lib(comm_semigroup).CommSemigroup](x0: T0, x1: T0) { T0.mul(x0, x1) = T0.mul(x1, x0) }[R](R.1, from_nat[R](1) * R.1)
function[T0: lib(semiring.base).Semiring] { from_nat[T0](1) = T0.1 }[R]
function[T0: lib(monoid).Monoid](x0: T0) { T0.1 * x0 = x0 }[R]((a + b).pow(0))
function[T0: lib(add_comm_monoid).AddCommMonoid](x0: Nat -> T0) { partial[T0](x0, 1) = x0(0) }[R](binomial_term(a, b, 0))
function(x0: Nat) { x0 + 1 = x0.suc }(0)
function(x0: Nat) { 0 + x0 = x0 }(1 * 1)
partial[R](binomial_term(a, b, 0), 0.suc) != binomial_term(a, b, 0, 0)
function(x0: Nat) { partial[R](binomial_term(a, b, x0), x0.suc) != (a + b).pow(x0) or f(x0) }(0)
partial[R](binomial_term(a, b, 0), 0.suc) = (a + b).pow(0)
partial[R](binomial_term(a, b, 0), 0.suc) != (a + b).pow(0)
function[T0: lib(monoid).Monoid](x0: Nat, x1: Nat, x2: T0) { x0.suc != x1 or T0.mul(x2, T0.pow(x2, x0)) = T0.pow(x2, x1) }[R](m, m.suc, a + b)
function(x0: Nat) { not f(x0) or partial[R](binomial_term(a, b, x0), x0.suc) = (a + b).pow(x0) }(m)

goal: (a + b).pow(m.suc) = (a + b) * partial[R](binomial_term(a, b, m), m.suc)
proof: (a + b) * (a + b).pow(m) != (a + b).pow(m.suc)
function[T0: CommRing](x0: T0, x1: T0, x2: Nat) { partial[T0](binomial_term[T0](x0, x1, x2.suc), x2.suc.suc) = T0.add(x0, x1) * partial[T0](binomial_term[T0](x0, x1, x2), x2.suc) }[R](a, b, m)
function(x0: Nat) { partial[R](binomial_term(a, b, x0), x0.suc) != (a + b).pow(x0) or f(x0) }(m.suc)
partial[R](binomial_term(a, b, m.suc), m.suc.suc) != (a + b).pow(m.suc)
let s0: (Nat -> Bool) -> Nat satisfy { forall(x0: Nat -> Bool, x1: Nat) { not x0(0) or x0(s0(x0)) or x0(x1) } and forall(x2: Nat -> Bool, x3: Nat) { not x2(0) or not x2(s0(x2).suc) or x2(x3) } }
function(x0: Nat) { not f(x0) or f(x0.suc) }(s0(f))
function(x0: Nat -> Bool, x1: Nat) { not x0(0) or not x0(s0(x0).suc) or x0(x1) }(f, n)
not f(s0(f).suc)
function(x0: Nat -> Bool, x1: Nat) { not x0(0) or x0(s0(x0)) or x0(x1) }(f, n)
not f(s0(f))
function(x0: Nat) { not f(x0) or partial[R](binomial_term(a, b, x0), x0.suc) = (a + b).pow(x0) }(n)
